ai_justification.overview: The two syllabi are highly aligned in terms of topic coverage, learning objectives, and conceptual depth. Differences are largely structural or phrasing-related, with no significant changes to expected student outcomes.
key_similarities: Both syllabi cover the same core topics with near-identical learning outcomes
Conceptual understanding and application are emphasised consistently
Assessment expectations remain largely unchanged across both syllabi
key_differences: Minor rewording of learning objectives for clarity
Small changes in topic ordering without content impact
Additional guiding notes added in the newer syllabus
ai_justification.recommendation: Students transitioning between these syllabi can continue their studies with minimal adjustment, focusing mainly on familiarising themselves with minor structural or wording changes.
